title: Nexsh
description: Nexsh is a monolithic application that provides a modern browser-based command-line interface for executing various operations. It uses a custom React hook to manage the terminal interface and interacts with a Node.js API for database operations on documents, inspired by MongoDB.

title: Vesto
description: Vesto is a web application focused on solving optimization problems, specifically maximization and minimization tasks. It provides an intuitive interface to visualize each stage of the process until reaching the final result.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: This is my personal portfolio, which you are currently browsing, a place where I can tell you abaout myself, publish my projects and much more.

title: GorillaType
description: GorillaType is a small web application inspired by Monkey Type, created as a personal challenge to build something different. It allows users to practice typing by writing popular phrases, with options to configure the interface color and switch between English and Spanish.
